name: Punch Party (VitorMakesGames, AdilRouibet)
description:
Punch Party is a 3d fighting game made using Unreal Engine. Create your character and box your way to the top with multiple attacks and combos.

Design your character with a wide array of colours, boxing gloves and facial features.

Fight combatants in four different settings.

Playable with mouse and keyboard but Xbox controller strongly recommended,

for input mapping, check the in-game options menu. 

Created as a work experience project with IT Sligo.

Design + Creative Genius: Adil Rouibet

Project Lead + Programming: Vitor Barbosa
